3100.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|94|309$إِنِّى|"Indeed , I am|114|156|312$لِعَمَلِكُم|(of) your deed|116|158|13037$مِّنَ|of|50|92|156$ٱلْقَالِينَ|those who detest.|142|163|13038$

3103.verse: إِلَّا|Except|65|94|86$عَجُوزًا|an old woman,|116|173|13041$فِى|(was) among|106|163|89$ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ|those who remained behind.|206|235|6581$

3105.verse: وَأَمْطَرْنَا|And We rained|116|144|6582$عَلَيْهِم|upon them|90|147|22$مَّطَرًا‌ۖ|a rain,|75|132|6583$فَسَآءَ|and evil was|102|159|3997$مَطَرُ|(was) the rain|114|142|13043$ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ|(on) those who were warned.|217|217|8243$

3107.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|112|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|114|586$لَهُوَ|surely, He|86|113|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|172|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|154|398$

3115.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|112|25$تَبْخَسُواْ|deprive|91|104|6587$ٱلنَّاسَ|people|75|88|446$أَشْيَآءَهُمْ|(of) their things,|130|143|6588$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|117|25$تَعْثَوْاْ|commit evil|94|107|580$فِى|in|48|54|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|298|100$مُفْسِدِينَ|spreading corruption.|160|366|581$

3092.verse: The people of Lot denied the messengers

3093.verse: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

3094.verse: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

3095.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3096.verse: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

3097.verse: Do you approach males among the worlds

3098.verse: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."

3099.verse: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."

3100.verse: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].

3101.verse: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."

3102.verse: So We saved him and his family, all,

3103.verse: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.

3105.verse: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.

3106.verse: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3107.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

3108.verse: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers

3109.verse: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?

3110.verse: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

3111.verse: So fear Allah and obey me.

3112.verse: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

3113.verse: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.

3114.verse: And weigh with an even balance.

3115.verse: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
